EmailTemplate.name: Doc Gen Approval Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Document Generation Request Submitted for QA - Employer Name: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
DGR {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Name} for {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Document_Generation_Request__c.DBA__c}, {!Document_Generation_Request__c.Employer_Type_Email__c} has been submitted for review and is now in the {!Document_Generation_Request__c.OwnerFullName}.
Thank you.
